function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential exposure to communicable diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hypothesized social distance may not reflect practical conditions, especially in spaces with strong population mobility or irregular shapes.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing distances","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Role of social distance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Development of social distance index p d","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Insufficient social distancing measures leading to increased disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social distancing measures leading to virus transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the adequacy of social distancing recommendations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring workers’ compliance with health protocols during self-quarantine","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on people’s willingness to embrace new technology and digital infrastructure for successful implementation of digital communication tracing and tracking.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robots and drones reducing interpersonal contact leading to potential loss of human connection and empathy.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in affected areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and hygiene measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adherence to lockdown measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to change from the wider public","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reversion to pre-pandemic behaviors and lifestyles without adequate preparedness for future pandemics","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Behavior patterns of individuals unwilling to conform with public health requirements","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Personal agency leading to variable levels of social distancing compliance","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Interaction between smart and non-smart workers in relation to psychological health outcomes.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effect modification by the current working mode","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The division of participants into smart workers and non-smart workers based on their current working mode.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity in the interpretation of the christmas effect and coronavirus effect in altering routines and practices","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of demographics due to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reinforcement of stereotypical car discourses and class distinctions by evs and ev marketing","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The promotion of electric vehicles may lead to increased car-based mobility and a decrease in the use of active and public transportation modes.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing health care inequalities among minority groups due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personalized recommendations for behavior change","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on mobility practices due to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption of social norms and practices due to the pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conspiracy linking 5g and covid-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance and deterrence of health personnel from using new e-health systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5g networks and the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of socioeconomic and cultural factors in the agent-based model may lead to ineffective policy recommendations for disease control and mitigation.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The analysis suggests that the model is weakest at the median 50th quantile , which may indicate that the model is poorly fit for the average case.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pedestrians violating social distancing guidelines","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social media event analysis may lead to the spread of misinformation and panic in the population.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social distancing as a major challenge.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on likert scale responses may oversimplify participants’ views and experiences.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Negative attitudes towards public transport may persist, leading to decreased usage and increased reliance on private vehicles.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact of warm and sunny weather on compliance with ’stay-home’ rules","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of fake news complicating crisis management","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential misuse of voice recognition apps and ai models for discrimination and stigmatization of individuals","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Coordination and collaboration challenges in different contexts","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmented management in public health emergency systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to data for evidence-based decision making","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited cooperation between different departments, hospitals, and institutions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fragmented governance and limited cooperation between different sectors and levels of governance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited pre-event preparations for disease outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Discussion of disease hotspots and prevention indicating potential for disease outbreak.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
